benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Puncture
effects: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals Piercing damage, you can reroll one of the attack's damage dice, and you must use the new roll.

benefits.name: Enhanced Critical
effects: When you score a Critical Hit that deals Piercing damage to a creature, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the extra Piercing damage the target takes.
